comments.content:
Hi Rob,

could it be [Modern Twenty](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203231452/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/modern_twenty_regular/&sample_text=BEING%20BRANDT&sample_size=48)?

More options in this font case, [Serif: Bracketed Modern Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203231452/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/subclasses/serif_bracketed_modern_display/&sample_text=BEING%20BRANDT). Even more delicateness: [Scotch Modern Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203231452/http:/www.shinntype.com/scotch.html).  
F
